title: Track Awesome Ant Design Updates Daily
_seo_title: Track Awesome Ant Design (websemantics/awesome-ant-design) Updates Daily - Track Awesome List
description: A curated list of Ant Design resources and related projects. The main idea is that everyone can contribute here, so we can have a central repository of informations about Ant Design that we keep up-to-date

items.title: Awesome Ant Design Updates on Nov 25, 2024
items.content_text:
### Related Projects / Themes

*   [Ant Design X (‚≠ê3.5k)](https://github.com/ant-design/x) - A React UI library @ant-design/x that Crafting AI-driven interfaces with React, seamlessly integrating smart chat components and API services at your fingertips.
*   [Ant Design Web3 (‚≠ê1k)](https://github.com/ant-design/ant-design-web3) - Efficient react components for building dapps easier | Connect crypto wallets and more Web3 UI components | Web3 icons | Supports Ethereum, Solana, Bitcoin, TON, Sui and others.
items.content_html:
Related Projects / Themes

  • Ant Design X (‚≠ê3.5k) - A React UI library @ant-design/x that Crafting AI-driven interfaces with React, seamlessly integrating smart chat components and API services at your fingertips.
  • Ant Design Web3 (‚≠ê1k) - Efficient react components for building dapps easier | Connect crypto wallets and more Web3 UI components | Web3 icons | Supports Ethereum, Solana, Bitcoin, TON, Sui and others.

items.title: Awesome Ant Design Updates on Sep 04, 2023
items.content_text:
### Tools

*   [Ruyi Design Assistant](https://www.figma.com/community/plugin/1192146318523533547/) Ruyi Design Assistant helps you efficiently use React component libraries(AntDesign) and Design Tokens for design in Figma, and easily get production-level component code.

### Components / Themes

*   [antd-phone-input (‚≠ê77)](https://github.com/ArtyomVancyan/antd-phone-input) - Advanced, highly customizable phone input component for Ant Design.

### Applications / Themes

*   [IDURAR ERP/CRM (‚≠ê7.5k)](https://github.com/idurar/idurar-erp-crm) - IDURAR is Open Source ERP/CRM (Invoice / Inventory / Accounting / HR) Based on Mern Stack (Node.js / Express.js / MongoDb / React.js ) with Ant Design (AntD) and Redux
items.content_html:
Tools

  • Ruyi Design Assistant Ruyi Design Assistant helps you efficiently use React component libraries(AntDesign) and Design Tokens for design in Figma, and easily get production-level component code.

Components / Themes

  • antd-phone-input (‚≠ê77) - Advanced, highly customizable phone input component for Ant Design.

Applications / Themes

  • IDURAR ERP/CRM (‚≠ê7.5k) - IDURAR is Open Source ERP/CRM (Invoice / Inventory / Accounting / HR) Based on Mern Stack (Node.js / Express.js / MongoDb / React.js ) with Ant Design (AntD) and Redux

items.title: Awesome Ant Design Updates on Mar 21, 2019
items.content_text:
### Non-JavaScript Libraries / Themes

*   [syn-antd](https://gitlab.com/synqrinus/syn-antd) - Ant Design wrapper for [ClojureScript](https://clojurescript.org/) and [Reagent (‚≠ê4.8k)](https://github.com/reagent-project/reagent) using [shadow-cljs](http://shadow-cljs.org/) with tree-shaking support. As with other ClojureScript libraries, it cross-compiles to JavaScript.
items.content_html:
Non-JavaScript Libraries / Themes

  • syn-antd - Ant Design wrapper for ClojureScript and Reagent (‚≠ê4.8k) using shadow-cljs with tree-shaking support. As with other ClojureScript libraries, it cross-compiles to JavaScript.

items.title: Awesome Ant Design Updates on Nov 10, 2018
items.content_text:
### Boilerplates / Themes

*   [Ant Design Pro](http://pro.ant.design/) - An out-of-box UI solution for enterprise applications :fire::fire::fire:
*   [Scaffold Market](http://scaffold.ant.design/) - scaffolds and boilerplates using Ant Design
*   [Meteor Antd Boilerplate (‚≠ê9)](https://github.com/elmarti/meteor-antd-boilerplate) - A basic social network built using Antd and Meteor. [Example](https://antdmeteor.herokuapp.com/login)
*   [React-PWA, PawJS and AntDesign (‚≠ê15)](https://github.com/Atyantik/example-pawjs-ant-design) - A pluggable boilerplate with SEO, PWA, SSR, Skeleton, Placeholders, etc. as some of its many features.

### Design Tools and Resources / Themes

*   [Ant UX](http://ux.ant.design/) - Sitemap templates for ux design in OG, Sketch, Axure, Affinity, Adobe XD.
*   [Kitchen](http://kitchen.alipay.com/) - Sketch Plugin with suites of functions to enhance designers
*   [Ant Design Design Resources](https://ant.design/docs/spec/download) - Sketch Symbols

### Angular / Themes

*   [NG-ZORRO-Mobile (‚≠ê802)](https://github.com/NG-ZORRO/ng-zorro-antd-mobile) - Ant Design Mobile of Angular
*   [ng-alain](https://ng-alain.com/) - ng-zorro-antd admin panel front-end framework.

### Vue.js / Themes

*   [ant-design-vue (‚≠ê21k)](https://github.com/vueComponent/ant-design-vue) - Ant Design of Vue.js 2.5.0+.
*   [antue (‚≠ê258)](https://github.com/zzuu666/antue) - A set of enterprise-class Vue UI components, following the Ant Design specification completely.
*   [vue-antd-admin (‚≠ê3.7k)](https://github.com/iczer/vue-antd-admin) - Ant Design Pro's implementation with Vue

### Icons / Themes

*   [Official Ant Design Icons (‚≠ê1k)](http://github.com/ant-design/ant-design-icons)

### Other / Themes

*   [Ant Design of Ember](http://idcos.github.io/antd-ember/#/home) - Enterprise-class UI framework based on Ant Design and Emberjs.
*   [Fable Ant Design (‚≠ê24)](https://github.com/evilz/fable-ant-design) - Ant Design bindings for Fable Elmish.
items.content_html:
Boilerplates / Themes

  • Ant Design Pro - An out-of-box UI solution for enterprise applications üî•üî•üî•
  • Scaffold Market - scaffolds and boilerplates using Ant Design
  • Meteor Antd Boilerplate (‚≠ê9) - A basic social network built using Antd and Meteor. Example
  • React-PWA, PawJS and AntDesign (‚≠ê15) - A pluggable boilerplate with SEO, PWA, SSR, Skeleton, Placeholders, etc. as some of its many features.

Design Tools and Resources / Themes

  • Ant UX - Sitemap templates for ux design in OG, Sketch, Axure, Affinity, Adobe XD.
  • Kitchen - Sketch Plugin with suites of functions to enhance designers
  • Ant Design Design Resources - Sketch Symbols

Angular / Themes

  • NG-ZORRO-Mobile (‚≠ê802) - Ant Design Mobile of Angular
  • ng-alain - ng-zorro-antd admin panel front-end framework.

Vue.js / Themes

  • ant-design-vue (‚≠ê21k) - Ant Design of Vue.js 2.5.0+.
  • antue (‚≠ê258) - A set of enterprise-class Vue UI components, following the Ant Design specification completely.
  • vue-antd-admin (‚≠ê3.7k) - Ant Design Pro's implementation with Vue

Icons / Themes

  • Official Ant Design Icons (‚≠ê1k)

Other / Themes

  • Ant Design of Ember - Enterprise-class UI framework based on Ant Design and Emberjs.
  • Fable Ant Design (‚≠ê24) - Ant Design bindings for Fable Elmish.

items.title: Awesome Ant Design Updates on Oct 21, 2016
items.content_text:
### Related Projects / Themes

*   [Grammar of Graphics](https://g2.alipay.com/) - Pure javascript, powerful semantic graph generation tool for big data which provides a set of graphical syntax that lets users build with simple syntax a myriad of charts and integrates a large number of statistical tools, ([Read more (‚≠ê124)](https://github.com/antvis/feedback)).

### Vue.js / Themes

*   [Vue.js Beauty (‚≠ê2.1k)](https://github.com/FE-Driver/vue-beauty) - Beautiful UI components build with Vue.js and Ant Design.
*   [Vue.js Ant UI (‚≠ê34)](https://github.com/kokoroX/vue-ant-ui) - Ant Design UI components built in Vue.js.
*   [Ant Design Vue (‚≠ê9)](https://github.com/lileilei/Ant-design-vue) - Vue.js version of Ant Design.

### Boilerplates / Themes

*   [React Admin (‚≠ê598)](https://github.com/fireyy/react-antd-admin) - React Admin UI built on Ant Design (username: admin, password: 123456).
*   [React Redux (‚≠ê417)](https://github.com/Justin-lu/react-redux-antd) - React Redux for CMS/Enterprise class apps (ERP/Admin) built with Ant Design.
*   [Webbf (‚≠ê456)](https://github.com/peterchenhdu/webbf) - Java demo that uses Maven to build the backend with Spring, Spring MVC and Mybatis. React, Reflux, Eebpack, jQuery, React-bootstrap and Ant Design.
*   [React Redux Intro (‚≠ê33)](https://github.com/LeuisKen/react-redux-intro) - Demo app built with Ant Design and can be configured to initialize a Redux dependencies.
*   [TODO MVC (‚≠ê10)](https://github.com/cupools/todoMVC-react) - Todo list built with React and Ant Design.

  • Grammar of Graphics - Pure javascript, powerful semantic graph generation tool for big data which provides a set of graphical syntax that lets users build with simple syntax a myriad of charts and integrates a large number of statistical tools, (Read more (‚≠ê124)).

  • Vue.js Beauty (‚≠ê2.1k) - Beautiful UI components build with Vue.js and Ant Design.

  • TODO MVC (‚≠ê10) - Todo list built with React and Ant Design.

items.title: Awesome Ant Design Updates on Oct 20, 2016
items.content_text:
### Resources

*   [Ant Design Mobile](http://mobile.ant.design/) - Configurable Mobile UI specification and React-based implementation.
*   [Ant Design of React](http://react-component.github.io/badgeboard/) - Graceful UI components out of the box, based on React.
*   [Ant Design SVG Icons](http://leungwensen.github.io/svg-icon/#ant) - Project to transform regular icon fonts into SVG format, supporting Ant Design icon fonts.

### Tools

*   [Antd Tools](https://github.com/ant-tool) - Very useful list of tools for Ant Design to create documentation, create new components, build tools and many more.
*   [Antd Tools Docs](http://ant-tool.github.io/) - Documentations for Ant Tools.
*   [iConfig Ant Design (‚≠ê7)](https://github.com/hutxs/iconfig-antd) - Boilerplate for quickly getting a new project up and running with a few useful transforms.

### Related Projects / Themes

*   [Ant Visualization](https://antv.alipay.com/) - Professional data visualization specification that aims to put several years of valuable data pattern group work in the process of exploring data visualization to share with all people who need data visualization theory. AntV consists of few parts, data, design specifications and rules for use of the chart, ([Read more (‚≠ê124)](https://github.com/antvis/feedback)).

### Boilerplates / Themes

*   [CL React (‚≠ê175)](https://github.com/chenliang2016/CLReactAntDesign) - Based on Ant Design front-end framework structures for enterprise back-office software.
items.content_html:
Resources

  • Ant Design Mobile - Configurable Mobile UI specification and React-based implementation.
  • Ant Design of React - Graceful UI components out of the box, based on React.
  • Ant Design SVG Icons - Project to transform regular icon fonts into SVG format, supporting Ant Design icon fonts.

Tools

  • Antd Tools - Very useful list of tools for Ant Design to create documentation, create new components, build tools and many more.
  • Antd Tools Docs - Documentations for Ant Tools.
  • iConfig Ant Design (‚≠ê7) - Boilerplate for quickly getting a new project up and running with a few useful transforms.

Related Projects / Themes

  • Ant Visualization - Professional data visualization specification that aims to put several years of valuable data pattern group work in the process of exploring data visualization to share with all people who need data visualization theory. AntV consists of few parts, data, design specifications and rules for use of the chart, (Read more (‚≠ê124)).

Boilerplates / Themes

  • CL React (‚≠ê175) - Based on Ant Design front-end framework structures for enterprise back-office software.
